data.name: Pinball Groupies
data.detailed_description:
Pinball Groupies is a solo sexually charged pinball simulation indie game for Windows PC! Conquer and unlock each level for memorable access to galleries containing photos of all of your fans.

You fill the shoes of a world champion Pinball Wizard, at the top of your game, and the fans love a winner... in this case I mean they really LOVE a winner! Play through 8+ different challenging levels of hot pinball action and excitement! The higher you score, the friendlier the fans get! It's time to score!

• 8 Levels of addictive pinball action featuring 8 gorgeous girls of varying personality and style.
• An unlockable level select and gallery of photos.
• Simplified controls

Play through 8+ different challenging levels of hot pinball action and excitement! The higher you score, the friendlier the fans get! It's time to score!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvida GTS 450 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card / integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3570K @ 3.40 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5 1600x @ 3.60 GHZ
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
